snippet: José Cuitláhuac Salinas, the nation’s top organized crime prosecutor abruptly resigned Thursday.
abstract: Mexico's top organized crime prosecutor Jose Cuitlahuac Salinas abruptly resigns one month after revelations of investigation into several officials for leaking information to nation’s largest drug trafficking organization.
lead_paragraph: José Cuitláhuac Salinas, the nation’s top organized crime prosecutor abruptly resigned Thursday.

headline.seo: José Cuitláhuac Salinas, Mexico’s Top Mob Prosecutor, Resigns
